name: Стрекоза и муравей
summary: Based on a fable by Krylov, and other sources: All summer, the grasshopper sings, plays music, and visits with its friends. Meanwhile, the ant works hard collecting food and building a shelter. The grasshopper makes light of the ant's strenuous efforts, but when winter comes, things are much different.
